licensing: Do not copy proprietary text; author original summaries.
privacy: Do not include secrets or personal data in approval responses.
safety: Do not overwrite existing approval response records.
Reject context and approval_id values containing path separators or dot-segments.

acceptance_criteria: Creates an approval response record under runtime/contexts/<context>/approvals/.
Fails when the referenced approval request is missing.
Logs a U.Work record when telemetry/log-work is available.

failure_modes: Missing required inputs (context, session_id, approval_id, decision).
Invalid context or approval_id value (not a safe path segment).
Approval request missing for the provided approval_id.
Failed to write the approval response file.

inputs.description: Bounded context name used to locate runtime/contexts/<context> (must be a safe path segment).
inputs.name: context

inputs.description: Session identifier tied to the approval request (safe path segment).
inputs.name: session_id

inputs.description: Approval identifier to respond to (safe path segment).
inputs.name: approval_id

inputs.description: Optional RoleAssignment label used when logging U.Work (default: Strategist).
inputs.name: role_assignment

inputs.description: Optional semicolon-delimited list of related DRR ids or paths.
inputs.name: decisions

inputs.description: Optional ISO-8601 timestamp_start override (used for deterministic testing).
inputs.name: timestamp_start

intent.goal: Record a structured approval decision tied to a prior request.
non_goals: Does not alter the original approval request.
Does not enforce actions beyond recording the response.

name: Respond to Approval

outputs.description: Path to the generated approval response markdown file.
outputs.name: approval_response_path

procedure.instruction: Validate required inputs (context, approval_id, decision) and ensure safe path segments.
Locate the referenced approval request and confirm it exists.
Write the approval response record with the decision and notes.
If telemetry/log-work is available, log the approval response with agent metadata when provided.

summary: Records a response to an approval request.
